item.description:
This event is on WEDNESDAY, 2/6.

To attract relationships that are supportive & loving (with partner, family, friend, colleague, boss etc), it is important to heal the emotional wounds of past ones. When you ignore or bury the hurt, the abandonment &/or rejection, they remain trapped within your body & mind. You give off a vibe that causes you to attract dysfunctional people who create even more confusion, pain & suffering in your life.


Ben Oofana, special presenter from New York, will share how you can:

- heal & transform deep seated patterns that cause you to attract people who are negative or abusive or who do not have the capacity to truly love you

- remove stagnant energy related to unresolved issues & burdensome feelings that accumulate in your body & mind and

- develop your intuition & sensory awareness

Join us to ignite your magnetic presence, your inner passion, warmth & sensuality to attract relationships that are loving & supportive.

*******************************************

About Ben Oofana:

Ben, healer, is drawn to indigenous cultures from an early age and found himself living among the Kiowa Tribe in Oklahoma at the age of 17. He began his training with Horace Daukei, the last surviving traditional doctor (medicine man) among the Kiowa Tribe. Ben went on to study with Chinese Master Li Tai Liang. He continues to train intensively in the Chinese systems of xin yi, bagua, tai chi and chi gong.

*******************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

*******************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Heal the Loss to Attract Supportive, Loving Relationships
